title: Ethereum Merge on track as Goerli test merge successfully finalized
description: With the Goerli merge going successfully, there is growing confidence that there will be no further delays to the Ethereum Merge set for mid-September. After Ropsten and Sepolia, Goerli was the last remaining...
content:
<div><article><p> With the Goerli merge going successfully, there is growing confidence that there will be no further delays to the Ethereum Merge set for mid-September. </p><div><picture><source media="(min-width: 1200px)" srcset="https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/717_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 1x, https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/1434_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 2x"></source><source media="(min-width: 992px)" srcset="https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/587_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 1x, https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/1174_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 2x"></source><source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/638_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 1x, https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/1276_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 2x"></source><source media="(min-width: 480px)" srcset="https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/747_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 1x, https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/1494_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 2x"></source><img srcset="https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/480_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 1x, https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/960_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg 2x" src="https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/1434_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjItMDgvZTdjZDQ3ZWQtMGViZC00YzA3LWIwYzUtMTQ3ZTE5MTFmMGY1LmpwZWc=.jpg" alt="Ethereum Merge on track as Goerli test merge successfully finalized " /></picture></div><div><div><p>After Ropsten
and Sepolia, Goerli was the last remaining testnet scheduled to undergo the Merge, officially becoming a <a target="_blank" href="https://cointelegraph.com/blockchain-for-beginners/proof-of-stake-vs-proof-of-work:-differences-explained">proof-of-stake (PoS)</a> blockchain as of 1:45 am UTC, Aug. 11. </p><p>The Goerli testnet merge has
been finalized without any major issues today, suggesting that there will be no delays to the tentative Ethereum Merge date set for Sept. 19. </p><p>Numerous key devs and figures in the <a target="_blank" href="https://cointelegraph.com/ethereum-for-beginners/what-is-ethereum-a-beginners-guide-to-eth-cryptocurrency">Ethereum
ecosystem</a> have taken to Twitter to share their enthusiasm over the successful merge, such as core dev Preston Van Loon and podcaster/ETH proponent Anthony Sassano, sassal0x on Twitter, who bullishly <a href="https://twitter.com/preston_vanloon/status/1557547131363364864" target="_blank">noted</a> to his 216,400 followers that “next up is (finally) the Ethereum mainnet!! The Merge is coming.”</p><blockquote><div><p>The Goerli testnet has been
successfully merged and is now a full Proof of Stake chain.</p><p>Next up is (finally) the Ethereum mainnet!!</p><p>The Merge is coming </p></div>— sassal.eth (@sassal0x) <a target="_blank" href="https://twitter.com/sassal0x/status/1557544104031973377?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">August 11, 2022</a></blockquote><p>However, some noted there were minor issues that were also present in the previous two testnet merges.</p><p>Ethereum developer Marius van der Wijden noted that there was some “confusion on
the network because two different terminal blocks and lots of non-updated nodes” that slowed the process down slightly but stated that things were looking “quite good” anyway. </p><p>While lead Ethereum dev Tim Beiko also shared a screenshot as soon as Goerli’s switch to PoS went through. </p><blockquote><p>pandas on the screen! <a target="_blank" href="https://t.co/0nYll6gImH">pic.twitter.com/0nYll6gImH</a></p>— Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth (@TimBeiko)
<a target="_blank" href="https://twitter.com/TimBeiko/status/1557543798523146240?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">August 11, 2022</a></blockquote><p>There is growing confidence now that the highly anticipated Ethereum mainnet merge with the PoS-based Beacon Chain will go through without a hitch, given that Beiko previously stated that the
<a target="_blank" href="https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-dev-confirms-perpetual-date-for-pos-merge">major upgrade will go through</a> on (or close to) his proposed date of Sept. 19 if the final merge trail runs went through successfully. </p><p>In what is being seen as one of the
<a target="_blank" href="https://cointelegraph.com/news/usdt-issuer-tether-also-confirms-its-throwing-weight-behind-the-post-merge-ethereum-chain">most significant upgrades</a> in blockchain history, the Merge will significantly
<a target="_blank" href="https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-merge-may-lessen-usage-for-other-chains-says-nansen-ceo-kbw-2022">reduce Ethereum’s energy consumption</a> while bringing the network one step closer to its long-term scalability, security and sustainability goals.</p><p>Once the Merge is complete, the next major landmark
will be the multi-phased sharding upgrade that will significantly enhance the “distribution of data storage requirements, enabling rollups to be even cheaper, and making nodes easier to operate,” according to Ethereum’s website.</p><p>Sharding essentially involves spreading the Ethereum database horizontally across shard chains, giving the network greater capacity while also taking the strain off the core network. </p><p>The price of Ether
(<a target="_blank" href="https://cointelegraph.com/ethereum-price">ETH</a>) has been on a meteoric pump in the lead-up to the Merge, with the price gaining 72.2% over the past 30 days to sit at $1,890 at the time of writing. </p><blockquote><div><p>And there we go! Goerli has merged </p><p>Shout out to all client teams, contributors and the whole <a target="_blank" href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ethereum?src=hash&amp;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ethereum</a> ecosystem - what a
moment to share with you all! <a target="_blank" href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/TheMerge?src=hash&amp;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#TheMerge</a> is next</p></div>— Nethermind (@nethermindeth) <a target="_blank" href="https://twitter.com/nethermindeth/status/1557544618790617088?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">August 11, 2022</a></blockquote> </div><p><img alt src="https://zoa.cointelegraph.com/pixel?postId=91443&amp;regionId=1" /></p></div></article></div>
author: @cointelegraph
